attributes.action: Football Freestyle should be an Olympic sport
attributes.additional_details: Football freestyle is a very Beautiful sport to watch and it requires quite a bit of skill and physical activity. If done right in can be one of the most amazing things you will ever see and the football freestyle community is on the rise and would inspire people who aren't really good at football but are good at tricks to keep at their football. Also that creates a lot of opportunities for people who aren't too good at the game of football because they have something to cheer about
